code: import{style,createThemeContract,createTheme}from'@vanilla-extract/css';export var demo=style({width:150,height:150,backgroundColor:'#f00',color:'#fff',':hover':{backgroundColor:'#009'}});var colors=createThemeContract({color:null,backgroundColor:null});export var lightTheme=createTheme(colors,{color:'#000000',backgroundColor:'#ffffff'});export var darkTheme=createTheme(colors,{color:'#ffffff',backgroundColor:'#000000'});export var vars={colors:colors};export var essay=style({backgroundColor:vars.colors.backgroundColor,color:vars.colors.color});
